thread.title: Younger son of Lotte founder strengthens grip on conglomerate
thread.title_full: Younger son of Lotte founder strengthens grip on conglomerate

title: Younger son of Lotte founder strengthens grip on conglomerate
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 17, 2015, 05:16 BST - UK Markets open in 2 hrs 44 mins Lotte Holdings shareholders approve proposal backed by founder's younger son Reuters – 1 hour 51 minutes ago 254,000.00 +2,000.00 
TOKYO (Reuters) - Shareholders of Lotte Group's key holding company approved a proposal that calls for the company, led by current CEO Shin Dong-bin, to establish a stable management structure and strengthen its corporate government and compliance. 
Shareholders of Japan-based Lotte Holdings approved the proposal at an extraordinary shareholders meeting on Monday. 
Shin Dong-Bin, also chairman of Seoul-based Lotte Group and the younger son of the group's founder, is locked in battle with his elder brother over who will lead the South Korean-Japanese conglomerate. 
(Reporting by Ritsuko Shimizu; Writing by Joyce Lee in Seoul; Editing by Edwina Gibbs) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
